text: The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus are smartphones that are designed and made by Apple Inc. They were shared along with the Apple Watch at an Apple event on September 9, 2014. It was released on September 19, 2014. They both serve as a nest to the iPhone 5S. These models mark the first big increases in screen size since the screen of the iPhone 5, measuring at 4.7 inches and 5.5 inches. == Sales == The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus is the one of best-selling touchscreen phone of all time with ten million sold units in first week of release. == Features == The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus have Apple A8 Bionic Chipset, The iPhone 6 has a 4.7 inch IPS screen and The iPhone 6 Plus has a 5.5 inch IPS screen. The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus runs iOS 8. They can upgrade the other versions like iOS 9, iOS 10, iOS 11 and iOS 12 when came out. The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus cannot upgrade to iOS 13. The iPhone 6 has an 1810mAh battery capacity and The iPhone 6 Plus has a 2915mAh battery capacity. The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus have an 8MP rear camera and 1.2MP front camera. The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus have 1GB RAM. for the iPhone 6 has 16GB, 32GB, 64GB and 128GB Storage. For the iPhone 6 Plus has 16GB, 64GB and 128GB storage. == Related pages == *Apple Watch == References == == Other websites == * Official website 6 Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2014 Category:Apple products released in 2014
title: IPhone 6
